title: Lymphoedema: service provision and needs in Scotland

references.title: A phenomenological study of the lived experiences of people with lymphoedema.
references.raw: Williams A, Moffat CJ, Franks PJ (2004) A phenomenological study of the lived experiences of people with lymphoedema. International Journal of Palliative Nursing. 10(6):279-286.

references.title: Best Practice Document for the Management of Lymphoedema. International Consensus. London.
references.raw: Lymphoedema Framework (2006) Best Practice Document for the Management of Lymphoedema. International Consensus. London. MEP Ltd McGarvey C (2008) Early Diagnosis and Treatment Intervention for Lymphedema in Breast Cancer. Presentation to British Lymphology Society Annual Conference. Belfast. October 2008.

references.title: Clinical Resource Efficiency Support Team
references.raw: Clinical Resource Efficiency Support Team (2008) Guidelines for the Diagnosis, Assessment and Management of Lymphoedema. CREST Northern Ireland www.crstni.org.uk Hayes SC, Janda M, Cornish B, Battistutta D and Newman B (2008) Lymphoedema After Breast Cancer: Incidence, Risk Factors, and Effect on Upper Body Function. Journal of Clinical Oncology 26(21): 18-28.

references.title: Health-related quality of life with lymphoedema: a review of the literature.
references.raw: Morgan P , Moffat C, Doherty D (2005) Health-related quality of life with lymphoedema: a review of the literature. International Wound Journal 2:47-62.

references.title: Lymphoedema: an underestimated health problem.
references.raw: Moffat CJ, Franks PJ, Doherty, DC, Williams AF, Badger C, Jeffs E, Bosanquet N and Mortimer PS (2003) Lymphoedema: an underestimated health problem. Quarterly Journal of Medicine 96 (10): 731-738.

references.title: The prevalence of arm oedema following treatment for breast cancer.
references.raw: Mortimer PS, Bates DO, Brassington HD et al (1996) The prevalence of arm oedema following treatment for breast cancer. Quarterly Journal of Medicine 89: 377-80.

references.title: The problem of post-breast cancer lymphedema:impact and measurement issues.
references.raw: Armer J (2005) The problem of post-breast cancer lymphedema:impact and measurement issues. Cancer Investigation 1: 76-83.
